@tijs Yes I had the same problem. Though it works again as of now. Ben Firsh wrote that they had a minor Postgres issue, that's resolved now

Yes, the postgres service was failing to allocate new apps' databases; I've been away the last two days, and Ben didn't realise until yesterday - sorry about that! We'll work on making sure he gets more of the notifications.

Yes, sorry everyone, postgres service locked up (had it crashed it would have been restarted, but instead it just sat there)
I've just finished writing a whole new suite of nagios checks to make sure the processes still send heartbeats
